<final_answer>
To create a calendar event based on the meeting details in the document shared by Bob, first, ensure you have the correct email account information for Emma Johnson. The email account is also used for various other purposes such as rent, electricity bills, and conference registrations. 

Next, access the email account and find the email from Bob that contains the link to the shared document. Download the document and read it to extract the meeting details such as date, time, location, and description.

After extracting the meeting details, use a calendar application to create a new event. Fill in the event details with the information from the document: set the correct date and time, add the location, and include a brief description of the meeting.

Finally, save the new event in your calendar. If the calendar application allows, consider sending invitations to other participants if their email addresses are included in the document.

This process should help in creating a calendar event according to the details provided in the document shared by Bob.
